UDP Network Communication Library (UNCL)

The UDP Network Communication Library (UNCL) provides some basic routines for message passing and error detection using UDP sockets.

Author:
Daniel L. Heater
Version:
1.0
Warning:
This implementation doesn't account for endianess.
